
e2v CCD-261 back illum, deep depletion 3 phase AIMO spectroscopy device 2048X264.
This pattern uses the 4P channel with 3 speeds of 1.48MHz, 400kHz, 130kHz.

MGB 17/12/14 35 kHz section removed as no noise benefit. Position of Amp restores also moved to remove dark column if full sensor width to be offered
NOID section added to control the delay between entering inversion and starting horz shifts in FVB overlap

Sequence is I1, I2, I3 down towards the shift reg.
Image 3 is last row before shift reg.
Charge is transfered into R1 and R2 with R3 aligned with channel stops.
Sequence is: Node, OTG, SW, R3, R2, R1, R3...
S1 to S4	Storage area clks
I1 to I4	Image area clks
B		Engine branch bit
SB1 to SP4	Engine loop speed bits (1+2exp(n-1))
RST		CCD reset
PEN
HVF		EMCCD HV falling edge
AMP		Input amp restore
DSR
HVR		EMCCD HV rising edge
CDS		
R1 to R3	Horz register clks
MUX		Mux between analog channels
DSP
FIR		FIRE engine output
DSN
PA1		Pre amp gain 1 overide
FRA		FRAME engine output
RS		Reset sample (D-CDS)
SS		Signal sample (D-CDS); USB keep quiet
OSK		OS kill (stop CCD output amp glow)
CG2		Clamp-to-ground on analog channel 2
PA2		Pre amp gain 2 overide
PXL		Valid output pixel clk
SW		Summing well clk
****************************************************************************************
***PO1 original

****************************************************************************************

Digitization=16

00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SIIBSSSS 	SSI-ISR- 	-PH-AD-- 	HC-RR--M 	D-FD-P-F 	RSROCPPS
441 BBBB	123 23S  	 EV MS   	VD 31  U 	S IS A R 	SS2SGAXW
    4321	      T		 NF PR		RS     X	P RN 1 A	   K22L
<VS-st>
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00100000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00100000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001

00000000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00010000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
<\VS-st>					

<VS-all>	
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001

00100000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001

<\VS-all>

00011111	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001                                                                                                                                                                 
<\PDT>

SIIB---- 	SSI-ISR- 	-PH-AD-- 	HC-RR--M 	D-FD-P-F 	RSROCPPS
441      	123 23S  	 EV MS   	VD 31  U 	S IS A R 	SS2SGAXW
       	              T	 	 NF PR		RS     X	P RN 1 A	   K22L
<HV>					
00000110	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000001
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000001
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00010111	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
<\HV>

<VH>					
00001000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00000111	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
00000111	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	10100001
00011000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100001
<\VH>

1
<\NOID1.48-HR>

<\NOID0.13-HR>
